title: Power Rule of Exponents
text: For any real number a and positive integers $$m$$ and $$n$$, the power rule of exponents states that $${\left(a^m\right)}^n=a^{m n}$$
speech: For any real number a and positive integers  m  and  n , the power rule of exponents states that , parentheses a to the m-th  to the n-th is equal to, a raised to the m n power
pacedSpeech: For any real number a and positive integers   m
, the power rule of exponents states that  ,  a to the m-th  to the n-th is equal to, a raised to the m n power

title: Power Rule of Exponents
text: Use the power rule to simplify the expression: $${\left({\left(-3\right)}^5\right)}^{11}={\left(-3\right)}^{5\times11}$$
speech: Use the power rule to simplify the expression:  parentheses, parentheses negative 3  to the fifth  to the eleventh is equal to parentheses negative 3  raised to the 5 times 11 power
pacedSpeech: Use the power rule to simplify the expression:   ,  negative 3  to the fifth  to the eleventh is equal to  negative 3  raised to the 5 times 11 power
